name: Tetraformer
description:
Tetraformer is a tetromino/platformer mashup.

One player is the king and controls the falling pieces. Their goal is to complete rows of blocks to lower the rows above. They can also crush the other player by dropping a block on them.

The other player is the hunchback. They need to disrupt the king by moving blocks and attempting to reach the top.

King Controls:

  • Left/Right Arrow keys to move falling pieces horizontally
  • Up Arrow rotates falling piece
  • Down arrow makes the pieces fall faster

Hunchback Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to pick up and place blocks. Red square indicates the block you will pick up, and green square indicates where the block will be placed
